title: Zoom in and out
description: Zoom in and out of the canvas. The center of the Zoom will be the position of your mouse cursor.

title: Drag the canvas around
description: With the hand tool you can navigate on the 2D surface. Hold space when dragging your mouse.

title: Select a single layer inside a group
description: Often elements are placed inside a group. To select a single layer, hold Cmd/Ctrl while left-clicking. You can also achieve this by double clicking on your desired layer one or more times.

title: Copy link to specific screen or element
description: If you want to share a specific Frame or Group with another person, you can right-click to copy the link to this element. Note: This does not work for regular layers, just Frames, Groups and Components.
